concept.title: Tag management Permissions
concept.shortdesc: All administrators have access to tag management.

conbody.p: Using groups, you can define the following permissions for other users:

ul.li: Access to all tag containers in a specific environment (dev, stage, or live).
Access to a specific tag container in all environments.

section.title: Assign Permissions
section.p: Admin > User Management > Groups> Click a group.
Tag management permissions can be assigned to any custom group or any individual members of a custom group.
